titleStmt.title: This most deplorable case of an antient citizen who hath been an old, honest, and faithful servant of, and very great sufferer for the interest of the city of London, is most humbly desired to be read over by all good citizens with great care, seriousness, and due consideration.
titleStmt.author: Lee, Richard, fl. 1639-1678.

titleStmt.title: This most deplorable case of an antient citizen who hath been an old, honest, and faithful servant of, and very great sufferer for the interest of the city of London, is most humbly desired to be read over by all good citizens with great care, seriousness, and due consideration.
titleStmt.author: Lee, Richard, fl. 1639-1678.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Richard Lee by Wing.
